channel.title: Burning Isle v1 100 Downloads
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i349.photobucket.com/albums/q398/sk4r3dpkz/BurningIsleLogo.jpg[/img][/center]
Well, some of you may have seen my thread for this server in the development section. I have run out of ideas for stuff to add to the server, but I am going to release what I currently have. I may make updates in the future, but I am stopping programming for a little bit to focus on other things going on in my life. Well is a list of features that this server has.
[center]New Home Area - Based in Port Phasmatys New Shop Area - Right next to where you first log in New Train Area - Based in Southern Sophanem Slow Training (15 EXP PER DAMAGE) New 3rd Age Minigame - Based in Fenkenstrain's Castle New Barrows System - Will explain later Kalphite Queen - Normal Edgeville PKing - Normal Portal Room PKing - Tiny PK area above the portal room Completely Portal Based - There is no teleports unless you are staff members. New PK Reward System - Receive 1 Ecto-Token per kill. Spend Ecto-Tokens on rewards such as Fire Cape (1000 tokens), or a Red Party Hat (500 tokens). New Jad Area - Completely New. Made it from an empty terrain area. [/center]
Here are some pictures...
Home: [IMG]http://i349.photobucket.com/albums/q398/sk4r3dpkz/HomeArea.jpg[/img]
Train: [IMG]http://i349.photobucket.com/albums/q398/sk4r3dpkz/TrainArea.jpg[/img]
Shops: [IMG]http://i349.photobucket.com/albums/q398/sk4r3dpkz/ShoppingArea.jpg[/img]
Kalphite Queen: [IMG]http://i349.photobucket.com/albums/q398/sk4r3dpkz/KalphiteQueenArea.jpg[/img]
Barrows: [IMG]http://i349.photobucket.com/albums/q398/sk4r3dpkz/BarrowsArea.jpg[/img]
3rd Age Minigame: [IMG]http://i349.photobucket.com/albums/q398/sk4r3dpkz/3rdAgeArea.jpg[/img]
Portal Room: [IMG]http://i349.photobucket.com/albums/q398/sk4r3dpkz/PortalArea611.jpg[/img]
Portal PK with New Reward System: [IMG]http://i349.photobucket.com/albums/q398/sk4r3dpkz/PKRewardSystem.jpg[/img]
Jad: [IMG]http://i349.photobucket.com/albums/q398/sk4r3dpkz/JadArea.jpg[/img]
Bonuses: Since I ran out of ideas for the server, there is still a bunch of room for you to add new minigames or areas to the server. I never came around to making any skills besides combat and thieving, so you have almost all of the map to put stuff in.
Barrows: There are 4 different sets of keys (bronze, steel, black, and silver.) Each set of keys has 5 keys (red, crimson, purple, black, and brown.) Each set goes to a different chest. Bronze keys are the easiest to get, so they have the lowest rewarding chest. Silver are the hardest, so they have the best rewards. The chests are the only way to get barrows armor.
I have been working on this for a good bit, seeing as this was originally an Allstar-Scape source. I did clean out all of the commands, NPC's, Global Objects, and pretty much, anything that was in the files that I was not using. It is not entirely cleaned, but it is cleaned up a really good portion.
I left credits in the files, so please leave them there. Also, please don't leech. I don't care if you use this for your server, just give me some credits.
Here are my credits: 65% To Allstar 35% To Me
Source Link: http://uppit.com/v/L5H4SZ1R

item.title: Burning Isle v1 100 Downloads
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

Because all I did was edit stuff. Heck, I shouldn’t have even mentioned Allstar because all he did was edit a Czar source. But at least I know what I did, and don’t take more credit than what I did, unlike about 60% of the people who release servers.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

I did, but I did more better things to it before I deleted it. I hid it, I locked it with 5 passwords, and then I deleted it hoping I never open it again.

Here are my credits: 65% To Allstar 35% To Me

Also I noticed you didn’t take more than half the credits, as you don’t really even deserve above 35%

But for right now, my mind is drawing a blank. xP[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 12, 2009, 09:23:28 pm[/size][hr]Ehhh, cannot win them all. Glad to see most people like the server then. =P

item.title: Burning Isle v1 100 Downloads
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

I don’t like it because, you have only changed the coordinates of objects, NPCs, spawning, added a bit of this ‘itemonitem/itemonobject’ crap, it’s just like a plain Project Czar source with different spawn areas. And as for the PK System, all you added was addItem(, 1); and a few extra sendMessage("");'s removed the emote tab text, changed the NPC text above head in NPCHandler class, changed a few PK areas, and changed the training areas around.

Read full topic
